message.content:
cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI 

The paper discusses the challenges and benefits of interactive learning, which is a subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). It also emphasizes the importance of user interface design (cs.HC) and the use of big data (cs.IR) in the learning process. The platform described in the paper involves natural language processing (cs.CL) and leverages artificial intelligence techniques (cs.AI) to facilitate the interaction between the human teacher and the learning machine.
